snippet.title: Dankagu Radio Special Episode: What is crowdfunding?【Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost】
snippet.description:
A standalone Rhythm Action Game『Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost』
Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2190220/_/

The crowdfunding page is here! (Time period: 2022/11/04 ~ 2023/01/09)
*Please scroll down for the English version.
https://camp-fire.jp/projects/623672/

▼Check them out to know Touhou Project more! 
Character Introduction：https://youtu.be/_n_nY27NGS4
Arranged Touhou Music Introduction：https://youtu.be/pSGbbNKLyOw

---

Presented by Unknown X

○Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost Official website
https://danmaku.jp/phantasia-lost/en/

○Touhou Danmaku Kagura Official Twitter
https://twitter.com/danmakujp
